law.catch_line: This subtitle does not apply to a short-barreled rifle or short-barreled shotgun that is:...
law.text:
This subtitle does not apply to a short-barreled rifle or short-barreled shotgun that is:
an antique firearm as defined in § 4-201 of the Criminal Law Article;
a device designed or redesigned for use other than as a weapon;
a device designed or redesigned for use as a signaling, pyrotechnic, line throwing, safety, or similar device; or
a firearm that cannot:
discharge a projectile by an explosive; and
be readily restored to a firing condition.
